title: Analysis of Diff Eq, no context part - c

content.description: Let f be the function satisfying f′(x) = 4x − 2x f(x) for all real numbers x, with f(0) = 5 and \(\displaystyle \lim_{x\to\infty}f\left(x\right)=2\).
content.question: Find the particular solution y = f(x) to the differential equation dy/dx = 4x − 2xy with the initial condition f(0) = 5.

frqParts.text: Find the particular solution y = f(x) to the differential equation dy/dx = 4x − 2xy with the initial condition f(0) = 5.

topic.text: 7.7: Finding Particular Solutions Using Initial Conditions and Separation of Variables

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
